mapper.select: SELECT A.HOME_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.MDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDATE, A.PRODUCT_TYPE, NVL(A.MODEL_GROUP,'') MODEL_GROUP, A.COOLHIGHTEMP_AD, A.COOLLOWTEMP_AD, A.HEATLOWTEMP_AD, A.HEATHIGHTEMP_AD, A.ROOMTEMP_AD, A.DEFROSTTEMP_AD, A.OUTTEMP_AD, A.FANOUTRPM, A.FANFEEDBACKRPM, nvl(A.LITER,'') LITER, A.HUMIDITY, A.ROOMTEMP, A.DEFROSTTEMP, A.OUTTEMP, A.CHANGESTEP, A.MAINMODEINDEX, A.SUBMODEINDEX, A.LEAKCOUNT, NVL(A.REFRESHTIMER,0) REFRESHTIMER, A.ERRORCODE, A.MOTIONSENSOR, A.DOOROPEN, nvl(TO_NUMBER(A.POWER),''), POWER, A.COMP, A.DRAINHEATER, A.DEFROSTHEATER, A.LAMP, nvl(TO_NUMBER(A.RDATE),''), RDATE FROM TBL_REFRIGERATOR A
